summary: The diff implements the vast majority of the requested requirements. All core features are present: Internet Identity authentication, backend Motoko actor with per-user scoped data, List Manager UI reused for all four categories, Flight Log Entry form with computed total flight time, Flight Records view with filtering, Main Menu navigation, and aviation-themed styling. A few minor acceptance criteria gaps are noted below.

missing_requirements.requirement: REQ-2: Separate named functions addStudent, updateStudent, deleteStudent, listStudents (and equivalents for instructor, aircraft, exercise) — the backend uses generic addCategory, deleteCategory, listCategories functions rather than the specifically-named per-category functions required by the ACs.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend (backend/main.mo) exposes addCategory, deleteCategory, listCategories accepting a categoryType string rather than the distinct named functions addStudent/updateStudent/deleteStudent/listStudents etc. called out in the acceptance criteria.

missing_requirements.requirement: REQ-3: addFlightLog / getFlightLogs function names — the ACs specify addFlightLog and getFlightLogs but the implementation uses addFlightEntry and getFlightEntries.
missing_requirements.reason: Acceptance criteria explicitly call for functions named addFlightLog and getFlightLogs; the diff shows addFlightEntry and getFlightEntries instead.

hallucinated_features.description: User Profile setup flow with a ProfileSetupModal that prompts the user to enter their name on first login.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention a user profile or pilot name setup step. This feature (ProfileSetupModal, saveCallerUserProfile, getCallerUserProfile, UserProfile type) was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Dashboard statistics widgets on the Main Menu showing Total Flights count and Today's flights count.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only requests navigation buttons and a Logout button on the main menu. The stats panel was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Access control and authorization system (MixinAuthorization, AccessControl module) with admin token initialization.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention any role-based access control system or admin tokens; it only requires per-principal data scoping.
